intro.p: The GStreamer team is pleased to announce the first release of the unstable 1.5 release series. The 1.5 release series is adding new features on top of the 1.0, 1.2 and 1.4 series and is part of the API and ABI-stable 1.x release series of the GStreamer multimedia framework. The unstable 1.5 release series will lead to the stable 1.6 release series in the next weeks, and newly added API can still change until that point.
Binaries for Android, iOS, Mac OS X and Windows will be provided separately during the unstable 1.5 release series.

This module, gstreamer, only contains core functionality. For actual media playback, you will need other modules.
gst-plugins-base contains a basic set of well-supported plugins gst-plugins-good contains a set of well-supported plugins under our preferred license gst-plugins-ugly contains a set of well-supported plugins, but might pose problems for distributors gst-plugins-bad contains a set of less supported plugins that haven't passed the rigorous quality testing we expect, or are still missing documentation and/or unit tests gst-libav contains a set of codecs plugins based on libav (formerly gst-ffmpeg)

bug.summary: basesink: preroll issue for some clips which audio is shorter than video
identity: sync=true ignores pipeline latency and does not present itself as live element
gst-launch: incorrect parsing behaviour with spaces and quotes
streamiddemux: New " reverse-funnel " element
Add GstUri object for URI handling
check: update internal libcheck copy from 0.9.8 to 0.9.12
baseparse: allow skipping more data than currently available
filesrc: fails when using fifos
bufferlist: optimisation: pre-allocate buffer array in one go with the buffer list
utils: Unref/release pads in error cases when linking pads
gstvalue: failure to deserialize gsttaglist
baseparse: handling of EOS when no output produced
queue2: Process SEEKING query
docs: document caps parameter of gst_base_src_set_caps
gst-launch: On W32 gst-launch does not finish correctly after getting SIGINT
pad: allow probes to remove the data item whilst returning PROBE_OK
tests: Add missing unrefs of objects after use
[API] bytereader: add _get_sub_reader() and _peek_sub_reader()
concat: New element for concatenating streams
bus: signal watched added in a new thread-default context can't be removed
bus: Missing API to remove a bus watch
pad: should not allow flush-stop on inactive pads
typefind: Run the default have-type handler after all application handlers
dashdemux hlsdemux mssdemux: playback failing due to pad EOS state
inspect: Says there custom functions where there arent
valve: typo in drop property description
check: Add a function to check destruction of objects
gsturi: Remove unnecessary code
input-selector: Can't unblock after emitting a " block " signal
configure.ac: require GLib 2.34
timedvaluecontrolsource: Add some signals about values changes
baseparse: leaks caps in gst_base_parse_process_streamheader
funnel: Does not forward sticky events if no data was received
several typos in Plugin Writer's Guide
capsfilter: Add an optional delayed caps change mode
debugutils: Truncate parameter values that are too long
doc: Do not use deprecated gtk-doc 'Rename to' tag
gst-inspect: add G_PARAM_DEPRECATED to known flags
basesink: Answer the query position when receiving it from upstream
input-selector: _activate_sinkpad conflates two different functions
gstobject: Add gst_object_has_parent()
caps: Add gst_caps_foreach() and gst_caps_map_in_place()
gstconfig: Put gstconfig.h into $(libdir)/gstreamer-1.0/include
pad: fail drop queries
inputselector: sticky events haven't send out when active track reach EOS.
check.h distributed unnecessarily
debugutils: Add a gst_debug_bin_to_dot_data() method
Incorrect check version advertised
inputselector: Get the active sinkpad again after taking the lock when handling events
Add missing interface documentation
Incorrect version comparison in preset_get_keyfile ()
uri: Add parsing unit test based on GNet
Fix documentation of GST_CHECKS and GST_CHECKS_IGNORE
gtask: add thread name support on OS X and iOS
fdsrc: MinGW Compilation error: unknown conversion type character 'l' in format
multiqueue: Memory leak with DASH stream
printf: Add support for %I32
Clash between gst_element_get_clock() and gst_pipeline_get_clock()
gstutils: check uri before using it in gst_pad_create_stream_id_internal
flowcombiner regressions
check: cast element in ASSERT_SET_STATE.
tools: bash completion for gst-inspect and gst-launch
utils: Add gst_bin_sync_children_states()
gst-uninstalled: add adaptivedemux paths from -bad
baseparse: Don't emit errors on EOS if we saw GAP events
gstvalue: Make sure GST_FOURCC_ARGS produces printable characters
pad: Don't fail latency query on unlinked pads
win32: Unnecessary LibXml include directive
Shorten __FILE__ in gst_debug_log output on all platforms.
basesink: drain query doesn't fully work to release v4l2 buffers
queue: can lock up the pipeline on serialized queries when downstream returns errors
v4l2src: Camera restarts when used with decodebin
check: tempnam deprecated warning
baseparse: does not preserve discont flag
printf: handle unsigned modifier for long long
New fundamental type for caps - GstFlagSet
tests: clock: Wrong testclock's name for test clock example.
tee: Add property that allows having all source pads unlinked
input-selector: eos is always forwarded, even from unselected pads
pluginloader: Fix typos
debugutils: Plot GstCapsFeatures in dot files.
bus: Segmentation fault in function gst_bus_set_flushing() when called with bus==NULL
Disable g-ir-scanner cache on build
tests: filesink: add test for GstFileSink render_list implemention
gstpad: Fix a typo in a doc string
test: filesink: add test to verify rendering buffers with multiple memory blocks
memory: add check for memory writability in resize()
doc: bufferlist: Update document for return value of gst_buffer_list_get
bufferlist: add check for writable object in insert or remove
Inconsistent bin children state when a child fails to switch from NULL to READY
inputselector: fix leak in gst_selector_pad_chain()
gstvalue: failure to deserialize bitmask
basesrc: Always setting segment.start as DTS on first buffer
typefind: leak in gst_type_find_element_src_event
pad: idle probe doesn't block pad from pushing data
tests: input selector unit test often fails under valgrind
GstMetaTransformFunction returns gboolean but its retval is discarded
test: memory: add test for allocation params
basesrc: Remove unused assignment
Invalid read when printing debug output containing '%%'
gstevent: remove duplicated header
fdsrc: docs: fix and update documentation
basesink: fix QoS/lateness checking if subclass implements prepare/prepare_list vfuncs
PTP network clock support
Remove docs/code-reviews
miniobject double WRITE | EXCLUSIVE lock succeeds despite part-miniobject.txt forbidding it
memory: subclasses don't know map flags in unmap
gst-indent: Added support for gindent as executable name
playbin using fdsrc source hangs for with empty input
baseparse: parser is never marked as FLAG_LOST_SYNC on discont
basesrc: do not leak buffer pool in error case
fakesrc: the " pattern " property can be gotten but it is never set or used
